DOC.brief_summary: A comparison of the ability of DisCoVisc to that of other Opthalmic Viscosurgical Devices (OVDs) (DuoVisc®, BioVisc®, Healon5®, or Amvisc PLUS) regarding endothelial protection and anterior chamber space maintenance during non-eventful cataract surgery.
DOC.criteria: Unilateral operable cataracts Preoperative Endothelial Cell Count (ECC) ≤1500 cells/mm2 Intraocular Pressure (IOP) > 21 History of ocular inflammation Systemic or ocular diseases affecting corneal endothelium
